metadata.name: 𝓢𝓟𝓔𝓔𝓓 FOULARD CM NO. 1
metadata.description:
The foulard is in free fall and we capture its descending silhouette from three perspectives. Displaying each unique movement to highlight the dynamic details.

The collector will also receive one of three silk crêpe satin foulards. Made of a high quality silk fabric, which was specially manufactured for these pieces, our emblem is already part of the fabric’s DNA through the jacquard weaving method. 

100% Silk Crêpe Satin 
Square Shape 
Hand-rolled edges 
Produced in Italy
 Measurement: 65x65 cm 
Shipped in a handmade box
